message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $750,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $750,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider coming down to $600,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We understand your concerns about the price, but we're willing to compromise. We're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $700,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. While $700,000 is closer to my budget, I'm aiming for something around $650,000. Would that be feasible?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We're willing to make another compromise. We're willing to reduce the price to $675,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business, and we're getting close to your target.
Hi Alice, this is getting close to what I had in mind.  How about we settle at $660,000 and call it a deal?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We're willing to make one more compromise. We're willing to reduce the price to $670,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business, and we're getting very close to your target.
